text:
Your 1, 2 and 3 seem fine to me, not sure where the disagreement is there. #1 seems interesting not boring, but it has to be open, yes. I'm not interested myself in deep document stuff other than the base idea of keeping the structure in a more "data" state, with trees, versions, transclusions etc. I'm more interested in expanding to other types, such as (lower level) 3D and (higher level) semantics/data - well, calendar events, social networks, etc.

I'm 58 and have a lot of free time currently to work on this stuff, so I'm both better and worse off than you!

What deep water? What proper gear? What Turing/state machine content are you referring to?
